files.description: Standalone script that discovers agent-specific deliverables, migrates/copies them into runtime/outputs/ canonical subfolders, updates runtime/outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.json to point at new paths, and generates runtime/outputs/CANONICALIZATION_REPORT.md with old-to-new mappings and actions taken.

Library module that scans the repository for deliverables under known agent output roots (e.g., code-creation, document-creation, and other agent-stamped directories) and returns structured records with metadata used for canonicalization.
Library module that defines canonical destination rules under runtime/outputs/ (naming, collision handling, hashing, and folder taxonomy) and computes deterministic old->new path mappings.

Library module that loads runtime/outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.json, rewrites tracked artifact paths to their canonical equivalents, preserves formatting/ordering where possible, and validates that all referenced files exist post-migration.

Library module that writes runtime/outputs/CANONICALIZATION_REPORT.md summarizing discovered artifacts, migration decisions (moved/copied/skipped), and a complete mapping table from old paths to new canonical paths.
Shared filesystem utilities for safe copy/move, atomic writes, directory creation, checksum calculation, and dry-run support used by the canonicalization pipeline.
Placeholder file ensuring the canonical runtime/outputs/ directory exists in version control for the migration target tree.
Canonical project tracker JSON file (created if missing) that indexes deliverables under runtime/outputs/ and is updated by the canonicalization script to reference migrated artifact paths.
Generated report file (created if missing) documenting canonicalization results, including old->new path mappings and any errors or skipped items.

missionDescription: Canonicalize and migrate deliverables from agent-specific paths (e.g., .../code-creation/... and document-creation outputs) into a single canonical tree under runtime/outputs/. Update runtime/outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.json to point to the migrated canonical files and generate runtime/outputs/CANONICALIZATION_REPORT.md documenting old->new mappings.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
QA and document analysis could not discover artifacts (0 documents analyzed / QA skipped). Path fragmentation is blocking automation and review.
